Jonathan Griffin.headline: Jonathan Griffin PhD
Jonathan Griffin.content: Client website that works within the High Performance Sports industry.

Trish Nannery.headline: Trish Nannery
Trish Nannery.content: Client website that works within the field of Psychotherapy and Addiction.

Bubble Sort.headline: Bubble Sort
Bubble Sort.content: Vanilla Javascript Bubble Sort Visualiser. Utilises ES6 Async/Await.

Spotify Clone.headline: Spotify Clone
Spotify Clone.content: Responsive Vanilla Javascript Spotify Clone. This clone plays copyright free music. Utilises the Web Audio API and module revealing pattern.

Multi Day Weather.headline: Multi-Day Weather
Multi Day Weather.content: Geo-location based multi-day weather app. Utilises the Dark Sky Weather, Google Geo-Location API and Async/Await and Promise based Javascript.

Hangman.headline: Hangman
Hangman.content: Popular childrens game, Hangman. Utilises the module revealing pattern and dynamic DOM content and manupulation.
